The carrier hopping pattern consisted of a repetitive sequence of seven frequencies chosen from a larger set of possible carrier frequencies. Since the modulation frame contained 8 pulses or chips, the 9,-30 carrier frequency for each chip position within the -modulationiframe was, cycled through the carrier hopping pattern. This guaranteed frequency diversity in the sync measurement in the presence of selective fading. The hopping patterns were selected such that each pattern used the whole trans­ mitted bandwidth (i. e., 500 kHz or 10 kHz as selected) and the number of pattern overlaps between members of the selected set were small for all possible time shifts.
